U

UNPIN_CLEAN - Static variable in interface global.GlobalConst
Optimization to avoid writing to disk when unpinned.
UNPIN_DIRTY - Static variable in interface global.GlobalConst
Forces the page to be written to disk when unpinned.
unpinPage(PageId, boolean) - Method in class bufmgr.BufMgr
Unpins a disk page from the buffer pool, decreasing its pin count.
updateRecord(RID, Tuple) - Method in class heap.HFPage
Updates a record on the page.
